segments.source_content: # Create a doc

translations.zh-CN: # 创建文档

segments.source_content: Create a Markdown file, `greeting.md`, and place it under the `docs` directory.

translations.zh-CN: 创建一个 Markdown 文件 `greeting.md` 并放置在 `docs` 目录下。

segments.source_content:
```bash
website # root directory of your site
├── docs
│   └── greeting.md
├── src
│   └── pages
├── docusaurus.config.js
├── ...
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_43a8bc7e

segments.source_content:
```md
---
description: Create a doc page with rich content.
---

# Hello from Docusaurus

Are you ready to create the documentation site for your open source project?

## Headers

will show up on the table of contents on the upper right

So that your users will know what this page is all about without scrolling down or even without reading too much.

## Only h2 and h3 will be in the TOC by default.

You can configure the TOC heading levels either per-document or in the theme configuration.

The headers are well-spaced so that the hierarchy is clear.

- lists will help you
- present the key points
- that you want your users to remember
  - and you may nest them
    - multiple times
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_cbbebf8e

segments.source_content:
:::note

All files prefixed with an underscore (`_`) under the `docs` directory are treated as "partial" pages and will be ignored by default.

Read more about [importing partial pages](../markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx#importing-markdown).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

`docs` 目录下所有以下划线 (`_`) 为前缀的文件默认会被视为"局部"页面而忽略。

了解更多关于[导入局部页面的信息](../markdown-features/markdown-features-react.mdx#importing-markdown)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Doc front matter {#doc-front-matter}

translations.zh-CN: ## 文档 Front Matter {#doc-front-matter}

segments.source_content: The [front matter](../markdown-features/markdown-features-intro.mdx#front-matter) is used to provide additional metadata for your doc page. Front matter is optional—Docusaurus will be able to infer all necessary metadata without the front matter. For example, the [doc tags](#doc-tags) feature introduced below requires using front matter. For all possible fields, see [the API documentation](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#markdown-front-matter).

translations.zh-CN: [Front Matter](../markdown-features/markdown-features-intro.mdx#front-matter) 用于为文档页面提供额外元数据。Front Matter 是可选的——Docusaurus 能够在没有 Front Matter 的情况下推断所有必要元数据。例如下文介绍的[文档标签](#doc-tags)功能就需要使用 Front Matter。所有可用字段请参阅 [API 文档](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#markdown-front-matter)。

segments.source_content: ## Doc tags {#doc-tags}

translations.zh-CN: ## 文档标签 {#doc-tags}

segments.source_content: Tags are declared in the front matter and introduce another dimension of categorization in addition to the [docs sidebar](./sidebar/index.mdx).

translations.zh-CN: 标签在 Front Matter 中声明，为[文档侧边栏](./sidebar/index.mdx)之外提供了另一种分类维度。

segments.source_content: It is possible to define tags inline, or to reference predefined tags declared in a [`tags file`](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#tags-file) (optional, usually `docs/tags.yml`).

translations.zh-CN: 可以定义内联标签，也可以引用在 [`tags 文件`](../../api/plugins/plugin-content-docs.mdx#tags-file)（可选，通常为 `docs/tags.yml`）中预定义的标签。

segments.source_content: In the following example:

translations.zh-CN: 在以下示例中：

segments.source_content:
- `docusaurus` references a predefined tag key declared in `docs/tags.yml`
- `Releases` is an inline tag, because it does not exist in `docs/tags.yml`

translations.zh-CN:
- `docusaurus` 引用的是 `docs/tags.yml` 中预定义的标签键
- `Releases` 是内联标签，因为它不存在于 `docs/tags.yml` 中

segments.source_content:
```md title="docs/my-doc.md"
---
tags:
  - Releases
  - docusaurus
---

# Title

Content
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4fb3ded8

segments.source_content:
```yml title="docs/tags.yml"
docusaurus:
  label: 'Docusaurus'
  permalink: '/docusaurus'
  description: 'Docs related to the Docusaurus framework'
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_d8159289

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Tags can also be declared with `tags: [Demo, Getting started]`.

Read more about all the possible [Yaml array syntaxes](https://www.w3schools.io/file/yaml-arrays/).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

标签也可以通过 `tags: [Demo, Getting started]` 形式声明。

了解更多关于[YAML 数组语法](https://www.w3schools.io/file/yaml-arrays/)的可能形式。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Organizing folder structure {#organizing-folder-structure}

translations.zh-CN: ## 组织文件夹结构 {#organizing-folder-structure}

segments.source_content: How the Markdown files are arranged under the `docs` folder can have multiple impacts on Docusaurus content generation. However, most of them can be decoupled from the file structure.

translations.zh-CN: `docs` 文件夹下 Markdown 文件的排列方式会对 Docusaurus 内容生成产生多方面影响，但大多数情况下可以与文件结构解耦。

segments.source_content: ### Document ID {#document-id}

translations.zh-CN: ### 文档 ID {#document-id}

segments.source_content: Every document has a unique `id`. By default, a document `id` is the name of the document (without the extension) relative to the root docs directory.

translations.zh-CN: 每个文档都有唯一的 `id`。默认情况下，文档 `id` 是相对于 docs 根目录的文档名称（不含扩展名）。

segments.source_content: For example, the ID of `greeting.md` is `greeting`, and the ID of `guide/hello.md` is `guide/hello`.

translations.zh-CN: 例如，`greeting.md` 的 ID 是 `greeting`，而 `guide/hello.md` 的 ID 是 `guide/hello`。

segments.source_content:
```bash
website # Root directory of your site
└── docs
   ├── greeting.md
   └── guide
      └── hello.md
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c9873cf8

segments.source_content: However, the **last part** of the `id` can be defined by the user in the front matter. For example, if `guide/hello.md`'s content is defined as below, its final `id` is `guide/part1`.

translations.zh-CN: 但用户可以在 Front Matter 中定义 `id` 的最后部分。例如，若 `guide/hello.md` 的内容如下定义，其最终 `id` 将是 `guide/part1`。

segments.source_content:
```md
---
id: part1
---

Lorem ipsum
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_36ae9dc7

segments.source_content: The ID is used to refer to a document when hand-writing sidebars, or when using docs-related layout components or hooks.

translations.zh-CN: ID 用于在手动编写侧边栏时引用文档，或在使用文档相关布局组件或钩子时使用。

segments.source_content: ### Doc URLs {#doc-urls}

translations.zh-CN: ### 文档 URL {#doc-urls}

segments.source_content: By default, a document's URL location is its file path relative to the `docs` folder, with a few exceptions. Namely, if a file is named one the following, the file name won't be included in the URL:

translations.zh-CN: 默认情况下，文档的 URL 路径是其相对于 `docs` 文件夹的文件路径，但有几种例外情况。具体来说，如果文件名属于以下情况之一，则文件名不会包含在 URL 中：

segments.source_content:
- Named as `index` (case-insensitive): `docs/Guides/index.md`
- Named as `README` (case-insensitive): `docs/Guides/README.mdx`
- Same name as parent folder: `docs/Guides/Guides.md`

translations.zh-CN:
- 命名为 `index`（不区分大小写）：`docs/Guides/index.md`
- 命名为 `README`（不区分大小写）：`docs/Guides/README.mdx`
- 与父文件夹同名：`docs/Guides/Guides.md`

segments.source_content: In all cases, the default slug would only be `/Guides`, without the `/index`, `/README`, or duplicate `/Guides` segment.

translations.zh-CN: 以上所有情况中，默认 slug 都仅为 `/Guides`，不会包含 `/index`、`/README` 或重复的 `/Guides` 片段。

segments.source_content:
:::note

This convention is exactly the same as [the category index convention](./sidebar/autogenerated.mdx#category-index-convention). However, the `isCategoryIndex` configuration does _not_ affect the document URL.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

此约定与[分类索引约定](./sidebar/autogenerated.mdx#category-index-convention)完全相同。但请注意，`isCategoryIndex`配置项不会影响文档URL的生成。

:::

segments.source_content: Use the `slug` front matter to change a document's URL.

translations.zh-CN: 使用`slug`前置元数据可自定义文档URL。

segments.source_content: For example, suppose your site structure looks like this:

translations.zh-CN: 例如，假设您的站点结构如下：

segments.source_content:
```bash
website # Root directory of your site
└── docs
    └── guide
        └── hello.md
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_eb25bb8c

segments.source_content: By default `hello.md` will be available at `/docs/guide/hello`. You can change its URL location to `/docs/bonjour`:

translations.zh-CN: 默认情况下`hello.md`的访问路径将是`/docs/guide/hello`。您可以通过以下方式将其URL修改为`/docs/bonjour`：

segments.source_content:
```md
---
slug: /bonjour
---

Lorem ipsum
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_9129c0c5

segments.source_content: `slug` will be appended to the doc plugin's `routeBasePath`, which is `/docs` by default. See [Docs-only mode](docs-introduction.mdx#docs-only-mode) for how to remove the `/docs` part from the URL.

translations.zh-CN: `slug`值会追加到文档插件的`routeBasePath`后（默认为`/docs`）。如需移除URL中的`/docs`前缀，请参阅[纯文档模式](docs-introduction.mdx#docs-only-mode)配置。

segments.source_content:
:::note

It is possible to use:

- absolute slugs: `slug: /mySlug`, `slug: /`...
- relative slugs: `slug: mySlug`, `slug: ./../mySlug`...

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

支持以下两种slug格式：

- 绝对路径：`slug: /mySlug`、`slug: /`...
- 相对路径：`slug: mySlug`、`slug: ./../mySlug`...

:::

segments.source_content: If you want a document to be available at the root, and have a path like `https://docusaurus.io/docs/`, you can use the slug front matter:

translations.zh-CN: 若需将文档设置为站点根路径（如`https://docusaurus.io/docs/`），可使用slug前置元数据：

segments.source_content:
```md
---
id: my-home-doc
slug: /
---

Lorem ipsum
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_028bef0a

segments.source_content: ### Sidebars {#sidebars}

translations.zh-CN: ### 侧边栏 {#sidebars}

segments.source_content: When using [autogenerated sidebars](./sidebar/autogenerated.mdx), the file structure will determine the sidebar structure.

translations.zh-CN: 使用[自动生成侧边栏](./sidebar/autogenerated.mdx)时，文件目录结构将决定侧边栏层级。

segments.source_content: Our recommendation for file system organization is: make your file system mirror the sidebar structure (so you don't need to handwrite your `sidebars.js` file), and use the `slug` front matter to customize URLs of each document.

translations.zh-CN: 我们推荐的文件组织原则是：使文件系统与侧边栏结构保持镜像（从而无需手动编写`sidebars.js`文件），并通过`slug`前置元数据单独定制每个文档的URL。
